channel.title: Basic 508-614 editing!? Please help
channel.description:
Okay.
I recently decided to make the switch from 317 to 614. I have coded inside and out with 317 for about 1 and a half years. However, I have very little experience with 614. I currently have Deception source, which is the same as most 508 or 614 sources, and they are broken down into the following folders-
Bin Com Data Deps
etc....
And, I just need to know how to get to the client.java so I can edit the owner, and the login messages.
If you could help me by replying, it would be very appreciated. All I need to know is to find-
Shop Handlers Client.java to edit login messages etc..
Thanks guys!
-Rocky500

item.title: Basic 508-614 editing!? Please help
item.dc:creator: @Rocky500 Rocky500
